text:
[Verse]
Stars in the sky so high
Twinkling like an eye
Late at night they shine bright
Guiding us through the night

[Verse 2]
Dreams in the midnight air
Wishes everywhere
Hold 'em tight never let go
Let your heart take control

[Chorus]
Shine shine little star
No matter where you are
Brighten up the darkest night
Make the world feel so right

[Verse 3]
Lost in the Milky Way
Love will find its way
Close your eyes see the light
Dance with hope through the night

[Bridge]
Whisper to the moon above
Send my prayers with love
In the silence you’ll hear
Echoes of all your fears

[Chorus]
Shine shine little star
No matter where you are
Brighten up the darkest night
Make the world feel so right
title: Stars in the Sky
